mapper.select:
SELECT id, template_id, datasource_id, datasource_type, module_name, filter_step, table_name, pro_table_name, module_rule, run_time_cron, module_exec_sort, module_state, create_time, create_user FROM tb_bizfilter_module WHERE del_flag = 1 AND table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND module_name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
